revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox dungeon |name = Energy Plant |image = [[File:Energy Plant.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Energy Plant. |tokens = 1,850,000 |location = In Hammerlocke }} '''Energy Plant''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 26,704,124 HP. == Encounter Tables ==..."
